name: Troll Encounter and Defeat
description: Encountering the troll in the Troll Room and defeating him with the elvish sword

entries.expectedOutput:
The Troll Room
This is a small room with passages to the east and south and a forbidding hole
leading west. Bloodstains and deep scratches (perhaps made by an axe) mar the
walls.
A nasty-looking troll, brandishing a bloody axe, blocks all passages out of the
room.
Your sword has begun to glow very brightly.
entries.notes: Entering the Troll Room from the cellar - sword glows to indicate danger

entries.expectedOutput: The troll fends you off with a menacing gesture.
entries.notes: Troll blocks passage - cannot move east

entries.expectedOutput:
The troll fends you off with a menacing gesture.
The axe crashes against the rock, throwing sparks!
entries.notes: First attack - troll defends and counterattacks

entries.expectedOutput:
The troll's weapon is knocked to the floor, leaving him unarmed.
The troll, angered and humiliated, recovers his weapon. He appears to have an
axe to grind with you.
entries.notes: Second attack - disarm troll temporarily but he recovers

entries.expectedOutput:
The fatal blow strikes the troll square in the heart: He dies.
Almost as soon as the troll breathes his last breath, a cloud of sinister black
fog envelops him, and when the fog lifts, the carcass has disappeared.
Your sword is no longer glowing.
entries.notes: Third attack - troll is defeated and disappears in black fog

entries.expectedOutput:
